DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine two drug help patient feel well cause tumor become small disappear ; evaluate safety give pemetrexed gemcitabine patient advance breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Pemetrexed Plus Gemcitabine Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients After Receiving Taxane Therapy
DOC.criteria: Must receive prior chemotherapy Taxol ( paclitaxel ) Taxotere ( docetaxel ) . Less 3 different chemotherapy treatment metastatic disease . Prior treatment hormonal and/or radiation therapy . Must disease measure . Must able take care self need example personal hygiene Must pregnant breastfeeding . Cancer spread brain . Treatment Gemcitabine Pemetrexed Unable take folic acid Vitamin B12 Treatment another cancer within last 5 year
